title: Blood.. Magic
body:
This magic is the kind of magic it likes... disturbing. I wonder what it will do for it if I do this quest line. It does seem cool though..
    Nah.. just kidding. Got to put a little humour in these notes, if that was humour, I don't even really know. Everything about this type of magic seems messed up.
    I mean, it just made me make a sacrificial dagger! Thats totally not disturbing. It wants me to prick my thumb and make it bleed! Like I'm actuallyl doing that!
